the name you were born with.

burg, Russia. My name was Pais--same as in United
States. The only thing I used to spell it--I am from
Lithuania so the name use to be spelled P--E--I--I--S.
And the first name in Russian they used to call me
different; Ted--I was changed my name when I came to
the United States and my name--my Jewish name was
Taschum, T--A--S--C--H--U--M.
